dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A one kilogram baby, just 45 days old, undergoing heart surgery in Shymkent—can you even wrap your head around that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A one kilogram baby, just forty five days old, undergoing heart surgery in Shymkent-can you even wrap your head around that?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A 45-day-old baby weighing just 1 kilogram has undergone a complex heart surgery in Shymkent, according to Kazakhstan's Ministry of Healthcare.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, born at 25 weeks, weighing only 655 grams… that's, like, barely over a pound. It's incredible they even made it to surgery.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, born at twenty five weeks, weighing only six hundred fifty five grams... that's, like, barely over a pound. It's incredible they even made it to surgery.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The surgery was performed at the city's perinatal center, where the infant, born prematurely at 25 weeks, was first admitted to the neonatal intensive care unit in early March. At birth, the baby weighed only 655 grams and measured 28 centimeters in length.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And the diagnosis was patent ductus arteriosus, which is already serious, but paired with respiratory distress syndrome—it's a miracle they stabilized the baby enough.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And the diagnosis was patent ductus arteriosus, which is already serious, but paired with respiratory distress syndrome-it's a miracle they stabilized the baby enough.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Doctors diagnosed the newborn with a congenital heart defect known as patent ductus arteriosus (PDA), along with respiratory distress syndrome.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they waited until the infant hit that one kilogram mark, which must've taken so much careful monitoring. The team must've been on edge for weeks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they waited until the infant hit that one kilogram mark, which must've taken so much careful monitoring. The team must've been on edge for weeks.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The medical team consulted repeatedly with pediatric cardiac surgeons before deciding to operate once the infant reached a body weight of 1 kilogram and its 45th day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And the surgeon, Asan Zhumanov from the Children's Clinical Hospital—imagine the pressure he was under operating on a heart that tiny.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And the surgeon, Asan Zhumanov from the Children's Clinical Hospital-imagine the pressure he was under operating on a heart that tiny.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The delicate surgery on the infant's heart was successfully carried out by cardiac surgeon Asan Zhumanov from the Shymkent Children's Clinical Hospital, assisted by anesthesiologist Akzhol Abdraimov from the city's perinatal center.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously, uh, the precision required is just mind-boggling. And shoutout to the anesthesiologist, Akzhol Abdraimov, too—keeping a baby that small under anesthesia safely? That's no small feat.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously, uh, the precision required is just mind-boggling. And shoutout to the anesthesiologist, Akzhol Abdraimov, too-keeping a baby that small under anesthesia safely? That's no small feat.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The delicate surgery on the infant's heart was successfully carried out by cardiac surgeon Asan Zhumanov from the Shymkent Children's Clinical Hospital, assisted by anesthesiologist Akzhol Abdraimov from the city's perinatal center.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And now they say the baby's stable but still critical, under constant watch with specialists like Gulmira Budukova and Yerasyl Shabetov. It's not out of the woods yet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And now they say the baby's stable but still critical, under constant watch with specialists like Gulmira Budukova and Yerasyl Shabetov. It's not out of the woods yet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The baby's condition is currently stable but remains critical. He is under constant supervision in the neonatal intensive care unit, overseen by Gulmira Budukova, deputy chief physician for neonatal care, and neonatologist-resuscitator Yerasyl Shabetov, the ministry said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's one of those cases where every single hour counts. But honestly, the fact that they even attempted this surgery gives me so much hope for neonatal care advancements.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's one of those cases where every single hour counts. But honestly, the fact that they even attempted this surgery gives me so much hope for neonatal care advancements.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. It really highlights how far medical science has come, especially in places like Shymkent's perinatal center. Just amazing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. It really highlights how far medical science has come, especially in places like Shymkent's perinatal center. Just amazing.
